:知+日=智(zhi) knowledge on top sun below, means radiant conscious intelligence.
 
:知+日=智(zhi) knowledge on top sun below, means radiant conscious intelligence.
 
:丰+丰+手+心=慧 (hui) two harvests on top hand in middle mind or heart below, means the harvest of deeper wisdom and ability for being aware of the unconscious or self-nature.
 
:丰+丰+手+心=慧 (hui) two harvests on top hand in middle mind or heart below, means the harvest of deeper wisdom and ability for being aware of the unconscious or self-nature.
  +   +
Some of the central teachings of Confucius in Chinese characters are:
  +
:人+二=仁 (ren) man on left two on right, the relationship between two human beings, means humanity, benevolence, seed. Originally the the character was just written as丨二 representing yin yang, the vertical line is yang (male, penis, heaven, odd numbers), the two horizontal lines are yin (female, vagina, earth, even numbers), it is the seed and core of everything.
  +
:如+心=恕 (shu) like or as if on top heart or mind below, means forgiveness and consideration. Confucius said,"Don't do to others what you don't want others do to you."
  +
:人+言=信 (xin) man on left word or speech on right, means trustworthy and integrity .
